title: Are you allowed to drink perfumes in Islam?
transcript: I don't have the microphone so we'll talk to him. Yes? Salam. First of all, I am a registered conditioner. Mashallah Tabarakallah. The weather is fine, we don't need air conditioners. Alhamdulillah. I have a question. Yes sir. Are you allowed to drink perfume in Islam? Are you allowed to drink perfume in Islam? If it contains alcohol, no. Because it will intoxicate you. He asked a legitimate question. Are we allowed to drink perfume in Islam? So if it contains alcohol or it is medically harmful, it is haram. Other than that, drink as much as you want. Alhamdulillah.
